[code] if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861)
{

setAnimation(426);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
if(PkingDelay <= 1)
{
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214)
{
createProjectile(absY, absX, 0, 3, 50, 160, 472, 43, 31, 0);

                            setAnimation(426);
                            teleportToX = absX;
